name: Student_ID
description: A unique identifier for each student

name: Study_Hours_per_Week
description: The average number of hours a student studies per week.

name: Attendance_Rate
description: The percentage of classes a student attended. Note: This column contains some values exceeding 100%

name: Attendance_Rate
description: The percentage of classes a student attended. Note: This column contains some values exceeding 100%

name: Previous_Grades
description: The average grade the student received in previous courses (scale of 0 to 100

name: Participation_in_Extracurricular_Activities
description: Indicates whether the student participates in extracurricular activities (Yes/No)

name: Parent_Education_Level
description: The highest level of education attained by the student's parents (e.g., High School, Associate, Bachelor, Master

name: PASSED
description: The target variable, indicating whether the student passed the course (Yes/No)
